attributes.name: adafruit-drv2605-photon
attributes.author: Harshita Gupta <gupta.harshita.001@gmail.com>
attributes.sentence: Arduino DRV2605 library ported for the Particle Photon. Makes code compatible with Adafruit Haptic Controller Breakout.

readme:
About
==
Ported version of the Arduino DRV2605 library to control the Haptic Controller Breakout via I2C, modified to meet the requirements of a Particle Photon library.
